short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get instant nutrition on recipes from top recipe sites, blogs, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The recipe nutrition calculator gives you instant nutritional information across dozens of popular recipe sites, blogs, and more! You can also paste ingredients quantities in the extension and it'll provide an estimate.
